aisstream.description: Real-time WebSocket AIS data from aisstream.io (requires free API key)

aishub.description: Community AIS data sharing from aishub.net (free, requires registration and data contribution)

marinesia.description: REST API fallback from marinesia.com (free, no key required for basic access)

gfw.description: Global Fishing Watch enrichment data (requires free API key, enrichment only)

notes.priority_explanation: Sources are tried in order. AISStream provides real-time WebSocket data. AISHub is community-based fallback. Marinesia is REST fallback.
notes.area_tracking_note: Set area_tracking.enabled=true to receive ALL vessels in the bounding box instead of only watchlisted vessels
